detail: 06:00: Pick up from Hanoi, 08:30: Depart from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay (approximately 3 hours' drive), 11:30: Arrive at Ha Long Bay, check in to the cruise, 12:00: Lunch on board with fresh seafood, 13:30: Visit Thien Cung Cave, one of the most beautiful caves in Ha Long Bay, 15:00: Visit Rooster and Hen Islet, the symbol of Ha Long Bay, 16:00: Visit Vung Vieng fishing village, experience the life of the locals, 18:00: Return to the cruise, enjoy dinner on board, 20:00: Rest, participate in evening entertainment activities on board such as squid fishing, watching movies, 22:00: Overnight at the hotel on board

06:30: Wake up, watch the sunrise over Ha Long Bay, 07:00: Breakfast on board, 08:00: Visit Ba Hang area, kayak to explore the caves and surrounding scenery, 09:30: Return to the cruise, check out, 10:30: Lunch on board as the cruise returns to the pier, 12:00: Return to the pier, end of Ha Long Bay tour, 12:30: Depart back to Hanoi, 15:30: Arrive in Hanoi, end of trip

06:00: Arrival in Hoi An, 08:30: Check-in at hotel, 10:00: Visit the Japanese Covered Bridge, 12:00: Lunch at a local restaurant, 02:00: Walking tour of the ancient town, 05:00: Boat ride on the Thu Bon River

08:00: Visit to local markets, 10:00: Tour of traditional craft villages, 12:00: Lunch at a riverside restaurant, 02:00: Free time for shopping and exploring, 06:00: Dinner and evening lantern festival
08:00: Pick up from your hotel, 09:00: Visit Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 14:00: Visit One Pillar Pagoda, 16:00: Return to hotel
08:00: Pick up from your hotel, 09:00: Visit Ho Chi Minh Museum, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 14:00: Visit Presidential Palace, 16:00: Return to hotel
08:00: Pick up from your hotel, 12:00: Arrive in Sapa, check-in at hotel, 14:00: Visit Cat Cat Village, 17:00: Return to hotel
07:00: Breakfast at hotel, 08:00: Trekking to Lao Chai - Ta Van village, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 13:00: Continue trekking, 16:00: Return to hotel
07:00: Pick up from your hotel, 10:00: Arrive in Mui Ne, check-in at hotel, 14:00: Visit White Sand Dunes, 17:00: Return to hotel
06:00: Sunrise at Red Sand Dunes, 08:00: Breakfast at hotel, 10:00: Visit Fairy Stream, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 15:00: Visit Mui Ne Fishing Village, 18:00: Return to hotel
07:00: Depart from Hue, 11:00: Visit Phong Nha Cave, 13:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 15:00: Explore Paradise Cave, 18:00: Check-in at hotel in Phong Nha
08:00: Breakfast at hotel, 09:00: Visit Dark Cave and enjoy zipline and mud bathing, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 14:00: Relax at Chay River - Dark Cave, 17:00: Return to Hue
08:00: Depart from Ho Chi Minh City, 11:00: Visit Po Nagar Cham Towers, 13:00: Lunch at local seafood restaurant, 15:00: Relax at Nha Trang Beach, 18:00: Check-in at hotel in Nha Trang
07:00: Breakfast at hotel, 08:00: Visit Vinpearl Land amusement park, 12:00: Lunch at Vinpearl Land restaurant, 15:00: Relax at Nha Trang Beach, 18:00: Return to Ho Chi Minh City
08:00: Depart from Ho Chi Minh City, 09:00: Visit Cu Chi Tunnels historical site, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 14:00: Return to Ho Chi Minh City
08:00: Breakfast at hotel, 09:00: Visit War Remnants Museum, 12:00: Lunch at local restaurant, 14:00: Explore Ben Thanh Market, 18:00: Return to hotel
